about_the_game:
Hot Import Nights: Cyber Clutch - Overdrive contains:

  • The Wasp
  • The Scythe
  • Each with 12 unique distinctive holographic customization items

content_descriptors.notes:
HIN: Cyber Clutch is an online vehicle combat game set in a futuristic, cyberpunk world. Players will need to shoot other cars. Vehicles in combat may display visual effects like (weapon) fire. There are no actual drivers in the cars thus no humans will be harmed in this game.
There are no depictions of human injury, death, or explicit content such as sexual acts, drug and alcohol abuse, or self-harm. This game focuses on strategic vehicle combat in a fictional setting.

short_description: Embrace the future of racing with the 'Hot Import Nights: Cyber Clutch - Overdrive Edition. This exclusive package features two unique car models - the agile Wasp and the sleek Scythe. Each comes with 12 distinctive holographic customization items, available only in this edition.
